700759f-a.text:
City Island Avenue (City Island), at the S. E. corner of Ditmars Street. Note the sign pointing to Casino Beach, on the island's east shore.
July 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
700759f-a.folder: City Island Avenue & Ditmars Street, Bronx, NY
700759f-a.original_title: Bronx: City Island Avenue - Ditmars Street

700751f-a.text:
402 City Island Avenue (City Island), east side, between Ditmars and Bowne Streets, showing Horace E. Smith's garage.
Summer, 1923
P. L. Sperr
700751f-a.folder: City Island Avenue & Ditmars Street, Bronx, NY
